text: Apartment No. 13 is a 1991 film by the Iranian director Yadollah Samadi. It was written by Hassan Gholizadeh and Ali Reza Khamseh, and starred Ebrahim Abadi, Akbar Doodkar and Jamshid Esmailkhani. It won the Crystal Simorgh for best film. ==References== Category:Iranian films Category:1991 films Category:Crystal Simorgh for Best Film winners Category:Persian-language films Category:Films whose writer won the Best Screenplay Crystal Simorgh
title: Apartment No.13
